articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Iranian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Hassan Rouhani, Iranian president, on Feb. 19 in connection with a recent passenger plane crash in Iran, that claimed huge casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the Iranian president and, through him, to the bereaved families of the deceased.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to New South African President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to New South African President
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Feb. 17 sent a congratulatory message to Cyril Ramaphosa upon his election as South African president.
					 Expressing the expectation and belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in the future, too, the message wished the South African president great success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country, peace and development of the region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by First Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Mozambican Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Mozambican Party Leader
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Monday received a floral basket from Roque Silba Samuel, secretary general of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: 22nd Kimjongilia Festival under Way in Pyongyang
articles.content:
22nd Kimjongilia Festival under Way in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Kimjongilia Festival is going on with large attendance in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Since its opening, tens of thousands of people have visited the venue of the festival on a daily average.
					
					 What draws many visitors in the festival is the stand of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries which depicts the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea with over 300 potted Kimjongilias, including 50-odd potted Kimjongilias presented by friendship and solidarity organizations and personages of different countries.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan put on display 216 potted Kimjongilias representing Jongil Peak with the photo of leader Kim Jong Il on its centre. 
					
					 The stand of Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country shows a large floral basket and Korean map made up with over 600 potted Kimjongilias including more than 80 potted Kimjongilias sent by overseas Koreans and former unconverted long-term prisoners, which instills into visitors the firm conviction that a reunified prospering power is sure to be built as they are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 And 200-odd potted Kimjongilias and 150 potted flowers on the stand of Kim Il Sung University assume the shape of a red flag wrapping around the globe to show the indomitable spirit of its teachers and students who strive to materialize Kim Jong Il's plan of turning the university into the world-class one.
					
					 Going round Kimjongilias in full bloom at the venue of the festival, visitors have keenly felt the great admiration for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: 2018 January Issue of Magazine "Thongil" Published
articles.content:
2018 January Issue of Magazine "Thongil" Published
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans published the January issue of 2018 of its monthly socio-political magazine "Thongil".
					 The magazine carried the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address for Juche 107 (2018) with a photo of him making the address.
					
					 Together with photos showing his revolutionary activities, the magazine highlighted the news that he gave field guidance to the newly-built Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory and other units of Samjiyon County, climbed Mt Paektu, a sacred mountain of the revolution, guided the 8th Conference of Munitions Industry, took part in the ceremony of awarding party and state commendations to the contributors to the successful test-fire of intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the greatest memorial day of the nation and delivered a speech at the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea and enjoyed a congratulatory performance together with the participants in the conference in December 2017.
					
					 It also introduced the statements and answers of the spokesman of the DPRK foreign ministry and the director general of the Institute of Disarmament and Peace at the ministry and a statement of a spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued in December last year to denounce the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces' anti-DPRK and a detailed report of the Korean Central News Agency on the situation of the Korean Peninsula dealing with the efforts of the DPRK in 2017.
					
					 The magazine carried news that the Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2018 was held on the New Year and other news.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves to Resume Joint Military Exercises after Olympics
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Moves to Resume Joint Military Exercises after Olympics
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Displeased with the atmosphere for detente being created on the Korean peninsula thanks to the peace-loving and proactive measure taken by the DPRK, the U.S. is openly going against it.
					 A typical example is the recent bluffing made by the U.S. charge d'affaires a.i. to south Korea, who at the instigation of the Trump group openly hinted that the joint military exercises with south Korea would be conducted as usual after the Winter Olympics and the issue of postponing the military exercises further has not yet been discussed.
					
					 The Trump group's racket for resuming the war exercises is a wild act of ruthlessly trampling even a small sprout of peace that has been now seen on the Korean peninsula, and it is a provocative act of chilling the active efforts of the DPRK and enthusiasm of the international community to defuse tension and create a peaceful environment.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. war shadow expected to loom after the Olympics has begun to be activated in its practical phase, not just as a hypothesis.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that whenever the DPRK-targeted U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises were held, the peace and security on the Korean peninsula were seriously threatened and hard-won atmosphere for reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south were spoilt in a moment.
					
					 What is more serious is that the Trump group recently announced it would expand the scope of the use of nuclear weapons so that they can be used even at the time of conventional weapon attack on the U.S. and its "allies", and the shipment of huge nuclear strategic hardware to and around the Korean peninsula is timed to coincide with this.
					
					 This has touched off the worldwide concerns. Lots of media and experts of the world are now worried that the resumption of the large-scale joint military exercises by the U.S. after the Winter Olympics would without doubt rattle the DPRK and chill the north-south ties that are showing positive sign, and would again push the regional situation to the extremes.
					
					 We have already clarified that we will resolutely counter any act of harassing peace and security on the Korean peninsula, and this is by no means any rhetorical threat.
					
					 However valuable the improvement of the north-south ties and the peaceful environment may be, the army and people of the DPRK will never remain an onlooker to the gangster-like acts aimed to encroach upon the security and interests of a sovereign state and to interfere in its internal affairs. The U.S. has to clearly understand this.
					
					 It is the principled stand and unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to counter provocation by prompt counterstrike.
					
					 The DPRK which has towered as a new strategic state will never flinch even an inch back from the path of defending independence and justice.
					
					 The Trump group has to ponder over the catastrophic consequence to be entailed by its reckless saber-rattling, and make a responsible choice.

articles.title: U.S. Is Left with Little Option: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Is Left with Little Option: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Recently the Trump group claimed that they can not but have recourse to a military option unless the "nuclear issue of the DPRK" is solved in a diplomatic way, which deserves serious attention.
					 On a number of occasions Trump hinted quite often at the possibility of the use of military muscle, uttering that options to solve the DPRK's nuclear issue involve both military and non-military ways and he wants to have the issue solved in a peaceful manner but there is a strong likelihood of solving the issue otherwise.
					
					 His confidants, including the vice-president and the secretaries of State and Defense, are vying with each other to build a world public opinion, prattling that if the DPRK doesn't select the road of dialogue and negotiations, they will pull the trigger for a military action and that they will solve the issue in a military way unless diplomacy succeeds.
					
					 At a time when the trend for improved inter-Korean relations is created on the Korean peninsula and the wish of the international community for peace and stability grows stronger thanks to the DPRK's pro-active efforts, it's hard to understand for the U.S. to tout a military option premised on the failure of what they called diplomatic ways.
					
					 It is obviously an expression of a hideous attempt to block the improvement of inter-Korean relations and again coil up the military tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. tries to put a brake on the DPRK's additional military steps by threatening the latter with belligerent remarks and further inveigle south Korea and neighboring countries worrying about a war into the racket of sanctions and pressure against the DPRK and secure a justification for a risky preemptive attack in an extreme case. This is the U.S. aim at killing three birds with one stone.
					
					 But such nonsense won't work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready for both dialogue and war.
					
					 The whole world knows this fact but why the U.S. is unaware of it.
					
					 It is naive and foolhardy for the U.S. to hurt Juche Korea, unaware of its faith, will and grits.
					
					 The Trump group driven into a tight corner within and without is tying to seek a way out by triggering a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are full of strength and will to teach the U.S. with resolute and merciless punishment that the latter's reckless military option will never offer a way to survive.
					
					 The Trump group spouted jargons that tourists should write a will before making a trip to the DPRK. If the U.S. dares to ignite a war against the DPRK, there will be left no one to keep a written will and bury a coffin. This is the answer of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is left with little option.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on U.S. Provocations for Checking Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on U.S. Provocations for Checking Improved Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the U.S. staged a military drill codenamed Warrior Strike in league with the south Korean military warmongers on the threshold of the Winter Olympics, under the pretext of improving the skills to remove the DPRK's nuclear weapons and missiles.
					 The drill, held at mock establishments including an underground tunnel, involved the main force of the U.S. Second Division.
					
					 The division got notorious during the Korean War and has played the role of advance party in every aggression war drill staged in south Korea.
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Monday says:
					
					 It is nothing but a provocative act of war maniacs to hold in check the stream of the improvement of the inter-Korean relation at any cost.
					
					 From the start, the U.S. did not want to see the improvement of inter-Korean relations and has done things only harmful to the atmosphere for improved relations and detente by deliberately aggravating the situation.
					
					 Such actions convince the DPRK once again that the interference and aggression moves of the U.S., chiefly responsible for the aggravation of situation, should be decisively smashed to ensure the smooth progress of improved inter-Korean relations and peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is the very one that escalates the tensions on the peninsula and stands in the way of the reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 If the atmosphere for improved inter-Korean relations and detente is spoiled, the entire blame for it will rest with the U.S. With any tricks the U.S. can never get rid of the responsibility.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was posted on a website by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), deals with the reactionary nature and falsity of the sophistry of the imperialists and the renegades of socialism calling socialism "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding".
					
					 It elucidates the principled issues arising in defending and accomplishing the socialist cause, including the issues of making socialism people's conviction and morale and giving full play to the advantages of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Kuwaiti figures issued statements on Feb. 9 to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, said that with his gifted ideo-theoretical wisdom and distinguished leadership ability Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party, strengthened the single-hearted unity of the whole society as firm as rock and turned the DPRK into a socialist country with tremendous military strength, adding: His immortal feats will be kept in the mind of mankind forever.
					
					 Noting that every year the world progressives are significantly celebrating the Day of the Shining Star together with the Korean people, Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, said:
					
					 It is because the great leader HE Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and to global independence.
					
					 He led the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence to victory with his energetic Songun revolutionary guidance.
					
					 Today, the army and people of the DPRK have turned out in the struggle to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander.
					
					 Victory is always in store for the DPRK as long as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and the army and people closely rallied as one around him.

articles.title: Joint Statement Issued in Switzerland to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Joint Statement Issued in Switzerland to Mark Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 76th Birth Anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Feb. 4 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il assisted President Kim Il Sung faithfully and wisely led the whole work of the party, state and army.
					
					 Through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, he developed in depth the Juche idea created by the President into the guiding idea in the era of independence and performed undying feats in the building of Korean-style socialism based on it.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics enforced by him, the DPRK demonstrated its dignity as the fortress of the world socialism.
					
					 Socialism collapsed in some countries and sovereign countries fell victim to the imperialist allied forces, but the DPRK grew stronger.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces are hell-bent on the aggression and interference in weak nations, but they have not dared to provoke the DPRK.
					
					 All the achievements made in the DPRK are a brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's noble patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente irani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente irani
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 19 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de Republica Islamica de Iran, Hassan Rouhani, en relacion con que se produjeron muchas perdidas humanas por la caida de un avion de pasajeros en Iran.
					En su misiva, el remitente extendio la profunda compasion y consuelo al destinatario y, por su conducto, a las familiares de victimas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Cyril Ramaphosa
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Cyril Ramaphosa
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica de Sudafrica, Cyril Ramaphosa.
					En su mensaje, el remitente expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises y formulo votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos responsables del destinatario por la estabilidad y la prosperidad del pais y la paz y el desarrollo de la region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de  coreanos residentes en China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion de  coreanos residentes en China
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, converso el dia 19 en un ambiente fraternal con la delegacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, encabezada por el primer vicepresidente Choe Su Bong, en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.

articles.title: En marcha la maquinaria de guerra "post-olimpiada": comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
En marcha la maquinaria de guerra "post-olimpiada": comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos desafia abiertamente a la atmosfera de relajamiento de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana que se crea gracias a las medidas pacifistas y protagonicas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Hace poco, la banda de Trump anuncio por conducto del encargado de negocios a.i. en el Sur de Corea que se efectuaran normalmente en el nivel de costumbre los ejercicios militares conjuntos con el Sur de Corea una vez finalizados los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales y no se discute ahora el tema de posponerlos otra vez.
					
					El reinicio del entrenamiento de guerra es un acto demencial y provocativo para romper hasta el embrion de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y obstruir los esfuerzos activos de la RPDC y la aspiracion de la sociedad internacional al alivio de la tension y la atmosfera pacifica.
					
					El hecho demuestra que la maquinaria de guerra de EE.UU. comenzo a moverse realmente.
					
					Es bien conocido que son amenazadas gravemente la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y se congela en un instante el ambiente de reconciliacion y cooperacion Norte-Sur, cada vez que comienzan los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sudcorea contra la RPDC.
					
					Lo mas grave es que la banda de Trump anuncio la ampliacion de la posibilidad de usar las armas nucleares hasta en el caso de ataque de armas convencionales contra EE.UU. y los paises aliados y, al mismo tiempo, introduce una gran cantidad de equipos estrategicos nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores.
					
					Por esta razon, muchos medios de prensa y especialistas del mundo expresan seria preocupacion opinando que si EE.UU. pone en practica los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura despues del fin de la Olimpiada Invernal, irritara indudablemente a la RPDC, echara el agua fria a las relaciones intercoreanas que muestran la senal positiva y pondra otra vez en extremo la situacion regional.
					
					Ya hemos declarado que haremos frente rotundo a los actos que perturban la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. Esto no es una amenaza retorica.
					
					EE.UU. debe saber bien que aunque son muy valiosos el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y el ambiente pacifico, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos no estaran con brazos cruzados ante las acciones gangsteriles encaminadas a violar a plena luz del dia la seguridad y los intereses de un Estado soberano e intervenir en sus asuntos internos.
					
					Responder a la provocacion con el contraataque inmediato: esto es la posicion de principios y la voluntad inconmovible del ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					La RPDC, emergida de repente como nuevo Estado estrategico, no dara ni un paso atras en el camino de defender la independencia y la justicia.
					
					Los compinches de Trump tendran que tomar una opcion responsable reflexionando seriamente de las consecuencias catastroficas de sus acciones belicosas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica de acto provocativo el nuevo ejercicio militar de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica de acto provocativo el nuevo ejercicio militar de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se conocio que en visperas de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, EE.UU. realizo con los belicistas militares surcoreanos los ejercicios militares "Warrior Strike" en las galerias subterraneas y otros establecimientos simulados bajo el pretexto de practicar la manera de eliminar armas nucleares y misiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					En esa maniobra desempeno el papel medular la division norteamericana No.2 que se gano la mala fama en la pasada guerra coreana y se arroga el rol de avanzada en los ejercicios belicos que se libran en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					En un comentario individual de este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de acto provocativo de los maniacos de guerra para romper a toda costa la favorable corriente de mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, y continua:
					
					Desde el principio, EE.UU. no ha deseado el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y se dedica a las maldades para estropearlo y romper el clima de distension agravando intencionalmente la situacion. 
					
					El comportamiento de EE.UU. redobla la conviccion de que se debe frustrar tajantemente la intervencion y acciones agresivas del imperio americano, opositor principal a la reunificacion de la nacion coreana, para alcanzar el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y defender la paz de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si se rompe el ambiente de mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur y de alivio de la tension, la responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre EE.UU.
